Content.Text:
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Phew, that should do it. Geez, these were in
pretty bad shape.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>So you're a farmer like Elise, eh?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Me? I'm <BLUE>Nadi</BLUE>. I'm a landscaper.
<PAGE>
Elise hired me to come and take care of her
garden.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Still, this place was in dire need of help.
Whoever used to be in charge here had no clue
what they were doing.
<PAGE>
You can't be haphazard in taking care of a
garden.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Fixing up this place is going to take more time
than I'd anticipated. I suppose I'll have to arrange
an extended stay at the <BLUE>inn</BLUE>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmph. Well, this was a waste of time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I've got too much work to stand around and
chit-chat. If you want to talk, come back later.
